contact.address: 1200 Ave McGill College, Suite 1680, Montréal, QC H3B 4G7

description.en: Canada’s only 24/7, national support service offering professional counselling, information, and referrals for young people. Services include crisis support via phone or text, professional counselling, and a peer-to-peer support community.
description.fr: Le seul service national de soutien 24/7 au Canada offrant des conseils professionnels, de l'information et des références pour les jeunes. Les services comprennent un soutien de crise par téléphone ou par texto, des conseils professionnels et une communauté de soutien par les pairs.

operations.hours: Phone: 24/7, 365 days/year. Text: 24/7. Live Chat: Daily 7:00 PM to Midnight ET.
operations.eligibility: Youth and young adults (ages 5 to 29). Available to all youth in Canada.
operations.application_process: No referral required. Call 1-800-668-6868 or text the shortcode.

verification_notes: Discrepancies regarding the "24/7" nature of the service were clarified; only phone and text are 24/7. Live Chat has restricted hours.

contact.address: 548 Market Street, PMB 15337, San Francisco, CA 94104

description.en: A grassroots hotline and non-profit organization offering direct emotional and financial support to trans people in crisis. Run by and for trans people, offering peer support without non-consensual active rescue (no calls to 911 without consent).
description.fr: Une ligne d'assistance et une organisation à but non lucratif offrant un soutien émotionnel et financier direct aux personnes trans en crise. Géré par et pour les personnes trans.

operations.hours: Hotline: Monday to Friday, 2:00 PM – 10:00 PM ET.
operations.eligibility: Transgender, non-binary, agender, and questioning individuals.
operations.application_process: Call the toll-free number. No referral required.

verification_notes: Service hours are limited to late afternoon/evening in the Eastern Time zone. The policy against calling emergency services is a defining feature.

name_fr: Ligne d’écoute d’espoir pour le mieux-être

description.en: Offers immediate mental health counselling and crisis intervention to all Indigenous people across Canada. Services are available via telephone and online chat, provided by experienced and culturally competent counsellors.
description.fr: Offre des conseils en santé mentale immédiats et une intervention en cas de crise à tous les peuples autochtones du Canada. Les services sont disponibles par téléphone et par clavardage en ligne.

operations.hours: Phone & Chat: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
operations.eligibility: All Indigenous people (First Nations, Inuit, Métis) across Canada.
operations.application_process: Call 1-855-242-3310 or visit website for chat.

verification_notes: Requests for services in Cree, Ojibway, and Inuktitut can be made, but availability varies.

description.en: Provides anonymous and confidential crisis counselling, safety planning, emotional support, information, and referrals to women experiencing any form of abuse. Services are available in over 200 languages.
description.fr: Fournit des conseils de crise anonymes et confidentiels, la planification de la sécurité, un soutien émotionnel, des informations et des références aux femmes victimes de toute forme de violence.

operations.hours: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
operations.eligibility: All women in Ontario who have experienced or are at risk of abuse.
operations.application_process: Call or text. No referral required.

verification_notes: The TTY number is 1-866-863-7868.

description.en: A confidential, anonymous, non-judgmental listening service for anyone who needs to talk. Run by volunteers to provide support and information.
description.fr: Un service d'écoute confidentiel, anonyme et sans jugement.

operations.hours: Daily: 6:00 PM – 2:00 AM.
operations.eligibility: No restrictions. Open to anyone in the Kingston community.

verification_notes: Service is anonymous and volunteer-run.

description.en: Provides immediate response, assessment, and stabilization for individuals experiencing a mental health or addiction crisis. Mobile crisis team available.
description.fr: Fournit une réponse immédiate, une évaluation et une stabilisation pour les personnes en crise de santé mentale ou de dépendance.

operations.hours: Crisis Line: 24/7. Walk-in Office: Mon-Fri 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM.
operations.eligibility: Individuals 16+ experiencing mental health/addiction crisis in KFL&A.
operations.application_process: Call the crisis line or walk in during office hours.

verification_notes: The 552 Princess St location serves as the hub for walk-in crisis services.

name_en: Victim Services of Kingston and Frontenac
name_fr: Services aux victimes de Kingston et Frontenac

description.en: Provides immediate crisis intervention, practical assistance, and support to victims of crime and tragic circumstances. Administers VQRP+ for financial assistance.
description.fr: Fournit une intervention de crise immédiate et un soutien aux victimes d'actes criminels.

operations.hours: Office: Mon-Fri 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM. Crisis: 24/7 via Emergency Services referral.
operations.eligibility: Victims of crime or tragedy in Kingston/Frontenac.
operations.application_process: Call or referral by police/emergency services.
operations.documents_required: Police report or incident number often required for VQRP+ funding.

verification_notes: Co-located with Kingston Police but operates independently.

name_fr: Centre d'aide en cas d'agression sexuelle de Kingston

contact.address: 400 Elliott Avenue, Unit 1, Kingston, ON K7K 6M9

description.en: Provides free, confidential support for survivors of sexual violence. Services include 24/7 crisis line, counselling, and accompaniment to medical/legal appointments.
description.fr: Fournit un soutien gratuit et confidentiel aux survivantes de violence sexuelle.

operations.hours: Crisis Phone: 24/7. Chat/Text: Daily 12:00 PM – Midnight. Office: Mon-Fri 9:00 AM – 4:00 PM.
operations.eligibility: Survivors of sexual violence (recent or historic) aged 12+. All genders.
operations.application_process: Call crisis line or office for intake.

verification_notes: Chat service can be accessed via website or texting the crisis number.

name_fr: Services aux immigrants de Kingston et de la région

contact.address: 837 Princess St, Unit 201, Kingston, ON K7L 1G9

description.en: Supports immigrants, refugees, and newcomers in adjusting to their new community. Services include settlement counselling, language assessment referrals, and connection to community resources.
description.fr: Soutient les immigrants, les réfugiés et les nouveaux arrivants dans leur adaptation à leur nouvelle communauté. Les services comprennent des conseils d'établissement et une orientation vers des ressources communautaires.

operations.hours: Monday - Friday: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM. (Closed 12:00 PM – 1:00 PM for lunch).
operations.eligibility: Newcomers to Canada (Permanent Residents, Convention Refugees, Live-in Caregivers).
operations.application_process: Call or visit to book an appointment.
operations.documents_required: Permanent Resident Card or landing papers required.

verification_notes: Confirmed lunch closure 12:00-1:00 PM.

description.en: Provides support for people living with or at risk of HIV/AIDS and STBBIs. Services include harm reduction (needle exchange), naloxone distribution, supportive counselling, and education.
description.fr: Fournit un soutien aux personnes vivant avec ou à risque du VIH/SIDA et des ITSS. Les services comprennent la réduction des méfaits, la distribution de naloxone et des conseils de soutien.

operations.hours: Office: Mon-Fri 9:00 AM – 4:45 PM (Closed 12:00 PM – 1:00 PM). Needle Exchange: Mon-Fri 9:00 AM – 12:00 PM & 1:00 PM – 4:30 PM.
operations.eligibility: People living with HIV/AIDS, or at risk/affected by HIV/HCV. Harm reduction open to all.

verification_notes: Office closes at 4:45 PM; Needle exchange specifically listed until 4:30 PM.

description.en: Provides low-barrier health services for marginalized populations, including needle exchange, opioid substitution therapy, Hepatitis C treatment, and safer consumption services.
description.fr: Fournit des services de santé à faible obstacle pour les populations marginalisées, y compris l'échange de seringues.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: 9:00 AM – 4:00 PM (Closed 12-1 PM). Sat-Sun: 9:00 AM – 1:00 PM.
operations.eligibility: People facing barriers to mainstream health care, homeless, or using substances.
operations.fees: Medical services covered by OHIP (care provided regardless of card status).
operations.documents_required: None required for harm reduction; Health card preferred for medical.

verification_notes: Confirmed weekend hours.

contact.address: 263 Weller Ave, Unit 4, Kingston, ON K7K 2V4

description.en: Provides gender-affirming health care including hormone therapy initiation, surgical planning/referrals, and social transition support.
description.fr: Fournit des soins de santé d'affirmation de genre, y compris l'hormonothérapie et les références chirurgicales.

operations.hours: Mon/Tue/Thu/Fri: 8:00 AM – 4:00 PM. Wed: 8:00 AM – 7:30 PM.
operations.eligibility: Individuals age 12+ residing in South Eastern Ontario seeking gender-affirming care.
operations.application_process: Self-referral accepted. Call to book intake.

verification_notes: Confirmed ages 12+. Confirmed Wednesday evening hours.

name_en: Kingston Community Health Centres (KCHC) - Weller Clinic
name_fr: Centre de santé communautaire de Kingston (KCHC) - Clinique Weller

contact.address: 263 Weller Ave, Unit 4, Kingston, ON K7K 2V4

description.en: A primary health care clinic providing medical care, nutrition, and social work support to residents of North Kingston.
description.fr: Une clinique de soins de santé primaires offrant des soins médicaux aux résidents de North Kingston.

operations.hours: Mon/Tue/Thu/Fri: 8:00 AM – 4:00 PM. Wed: 8:00 AM – 7:30 PM. (Phones answered 9-12, 1-4).
operations.eligibility: Residents of North Kingston catchment area without a family doctor (intake dependent on capacity).

verification_notes: Phones operate on shorter hours (9am start) than the clinic doors (8am start).

name_en: Hotel Dieu Hospital Urgent Care Centre (KHSC)
name_fr: Centre de soins urgents de l'hôpital Hôtel-Dieu (KHSC)

description.en: Provides assessment and treatment for non-life-threatening injuries and illnesses (e.g., cuts, sprains, infections) that cannot wait for a family doctor.
description.fr: Fournit une évaluation et un traitement pour les blessures et maladies ne mettant pas la vie en danger.

operations.hours: Daily: 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM (Registration may close early if capacity is reached).
operations.eligibility: Anyone requiring urgent, non-emergency medical care.
operations.fees: Covered by OHIP. Fees apply for non-residents.

verification_notes: Users should call to check current status before attending.

name_fr: Service des urgences de l'Hôpital général de Kingston

contact.address: 41 King Street West, Kingston, ON K7L 2V7

description.en: A full-service Level 1 Trauma Centre providing 24/7 care for life-threatening injuries and severe illnesses.
description.fr: Un centre de traumatologie de niveau 1 offrant des soins 24/7 pour les blessures mettant la vie en danger et les maladies graves.

operations.hours: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
operations.eligibility: Anyone requiring emergency medical attention.
operations.fees: Covered by OHIP. Fees for non-residents/uninsured.

verification_notes: Verified 24/7 Status.

description.en: A short-term, non-medical residential service for individuals withdrawing from alcohol or drugs. Provides 24-hour support and monitoring.
description.fr: Service résidentiel non médical à court terme pour le sevrage de l'alcool ou des drogues.

operations.hours: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
operations.eligibility: Age 16+. Must be intoxicated or in withdrawal. Voluntary admission only.
operations.documents_required: Health card preferred but not required.

verification_notes: Verified 24/7.

name_fr: Services dentaires de santé publique KFL&A

description.en: Provides dental screening, cleaning, and fluoride for eligible children and seniors. Administers Healthy Smiles Ontario and OSDCP.
description.fr: Fournit le dépistage dentaire, le nettoyage et le fluorure pour les enfants et les aînés admissibles.

operations.hours: Monday - Friday: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM (By appointment only).
operations.eligibility: Children: 17 and under (Healthy Smiles). Seniors: 65+ low income ($25k single/$41.5k couple) with no other insurance.

verification_notes: Verified.

name_en: KFL&A Public Health: Sexual Health Clinic
name_fr: Clinique de santé sexuelle de santé publique KFL&A

description.en: Provides confidential sexual health services including STI testing, birth control, and emergency contraception.
description.fr: Fournit des services de santé sexuelle confidentiels, y compris le dépistage des ITSS et la contraception.

operations.hours: Quick Test Clinic (Walk-in): Tue & Thu 1:00 PM – 3:30 PM. Appointments: Mon-Fri 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM.
operations.eligibility: No restrictions.
operations.fees: Most services free; some contraceptives at cost.
operations.application_process: Walk-in for Quick Test; Call for other appointments.
operations.documents_required: Health card not required for Quick Test.

verification_notes: Verified Quick Test Clinic.

name_en: CDK Family Medicine and Walk-In Clinic
name_fr: Clinique sans rendez-vous de médecine familiale CDK

description.en: A walk-in medical clinic treating minor illnesses and injuries for patients without a family doctor.
description.fr: Une clinique médicale sans rendez-vous traitant les maladies mineures.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM. Sat-Sun: 10:00 AM – 2:00 PM.
operations.eligibility: Anyone requiring non-emergency medical care.
operations.fees: Covered by OHIP. Uninsured fees apply.

verification_notes: Confirmed 175 Princess St is the designated walk-in location.

description.en: Operates 'In From The Cold' emergency shelter (adults/families) and supportive housing programs.
description.fr: Exploite le refuge d'urgence « In From The Cold » et des programmes de logement avec soutien.

operations.hours: Office: Mon-Fri 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM. Shelter: 24/7 (Intake usually evening).
operations.eligibility: Adults 25+ (In From The Cold). Youth (16-24) referred to One Roof.

verification_notes: Clarified that 540 Montreal St is In From The Cold.

description.en: A one-stop community hub providing wrap-around services for vulnerable and homeless youth, including mental health support, housing help, and life skills.
description.fr: Un centre communautaire à guichet unique offrant des services complets aux jeunes vulnérables et sans abri.

operations.hours: Drop-in: Mon-Fri 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM (Some programming until 7 PM).
operations.eligibility: Youth ages 16 to 24.

verification_notes: Verified.

name_fr: Refuge pour les jeunes de Kingston

description.en: Provides emergency shelter, food, and hygiene supplies for homeless youth. Also operates transition homes.
description.fr: Fournit un abri d'urgence, de la nourriture et des produits d'hygiène pour les jeunes sans abri.

operations.hours: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
operations.eligibility: Youth ages 16 to 24.
operations.application_process: Call or drop-in. First come, first served.

verification_notes: Critical Location Update: Emergency Shelter is at 365 Nelson St (not Brock St).

name_en: Dawn House Services and Housing for Women
name_fr: Services et logement pour femmes Dawn House

description.en: Provides emergency shelter, transitional housing, and supportive housing for vulnerable women.
description.fr: Fournit un abri d'urgence, des logements de transition et des logements avec services de soutien pour les femmes vulnérables.

operations.hours: Admin: Mon-Fri 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM. Shelter: 24/7.
operations.eligibility: Women 18+ who are homeless or vulnerably housed.
operations.fees: Shelter is free. Housing is rent-geared-to-income.

verification_notes: Admin office remains distinct from new shelter. New Emergency Shelter located at 2320 Princess Street.

description.en: Emergency shelter and support services for women, children, and youth experiencing domestic violence.
description.fr: Refuge d'urgence et services de soutien pour les femmes, les enfants et les jeunes victimes de violence familiale.

operations.hours: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
operations.eligibility: Women and children escaping violence.

verification_notes: Address is confidential (PO Box).

description.en: Provides sober living transitional housing for men experiencing homelessness. Focus on life skills and stabilizing housing.
description.fr: Fournit un logement de transition pour les hommes sans abri, axé sur la sobriété.

operations.hours: Mon-Sun: 9:00 AM – 8:00 PM (Staffed hours).
operations.eligibility: Men aged 24+, clean and sober for 2 months, no history of violence/arson/sex offences.
operations.application_process: Referral required (often via ODSP/Ontario Works or BNL). Application form online.

verification_notes: Corrected address to 669 Victoria St.
